meta.DESCRIPTION: Chat from your desktop with Threema Web and have full access to all chats, contacts and media files.

welcome.BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_DETAILS: Please use the latest version of Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox, otherwise the web client might not work properly.
welcome.PLEASE_SCAN: Scan this QR code with your Threema app
welcome.PLEASE_RELOAD: Please reload the page to try again.
welcome.CHOOSE_PASSWORD:
To stay logged in, please enter
a session password before scanning.
welcome.UNLOCK_FAILED_TEXT: You entered the wrong password, the session cannot be restored.
welcome.ENTER_PASSWORD:
To reconnect to your previous session,
please enter the password:
welcome.UNLOCK_FAILED_FORGOTTEN: If you can't remember your password, simply choose "forget this session", and set a new password.
welcome.MANUAL_START_TEXT1: Push service is not available. Are Google Play Services installed on your mobile device?
welcome.MANUAL_START_TEXT2: You can use Threema Web without Google Play Services, but you need to start the session manually:
welcome.MANUAL_START_STEP1: Open the Threema app and tap on "Threema Web" in the left navigation drawer
welcome.MANUAL_START_STEP2: Tap on the session related to this browser
welcome.MANUAL_START_STEP3: Select "Start session" to start the session
welcome.LOCAL_STORAGE_MISSING_DETAILS: Access to LocalStorage not possible. This can occur if your browser is configured to reject cookies, or if you installed a browser add-on that blocks access to LocalStorage. Please allow local storage in your browser settings or disable any add-ons you might have installed.
welcome.ALREADY_CONNECTED_DETAILS: You are already connected to Threema Web in another tab or window!

connecting.WAITING_FOR_APP_MANUAL: Google Play Services not installed. Please start the session manually.
connecting.CONNECTING_TO_APP: Connection to app is being established…
connecting.CONNECTION_CLOSED: Connection to server has been closed.

troubleshooting.SLOW_CONNECT: Connecting seems to take longer than usual...
troubleshooting.SESSION_DELETED: Did you delete this session on your phone?
troubleshooting.PHONE_ONLINE: Is your phone connected to the internet?
troubleshooting.WEBCLIENT_ENABLED: Is Threema Web enabled in the Threema app?
troubleshooting.PLUGIN: Is a privacy plugin installed in your browser which blocks WebRTC communication?
troubleshooting.ADBLOCKER: Do you use an ad blocker which also blocks WebRTC communication?
troubleshooting.PLEASE_UPDATE_APP: Please make sure that you're using the latest version of the Threema app!
troubleshooting.USE_ARCHIVE_VERSION: Alternatively you can switch back to the previous version of Threema Web.

common.CONFIRM_CLOSE_BODY: Do you really want to close this session?
common.CONFIRM_DELETE_BODY: Do you really want to delete this saved session?
common.CONFIRM_DELETE_CLOSE_BODY: Do you really want to close and delete this saved session?

messenger.VERIFICATION_LEVEL2_EXPLAIN: The identity of this person has been verified using e-mail or SMS.
messenger.VERIFICATION_LEVEL3_EXPLAIN: You have verified the identity of this person by scanning their code.
messenger.VERIFICATION_LEVEL1_EXPLAIN: There is no guarantee that this person is who they claim they are.
messenger.VERIFICATION_LEVEL2_WORK_EXPLAIN: The identity of this person has been verified by your Threema Work administrator
messenger.COMPOSE_MESSAGE: Type a message or drop a file
messenger.MESSAGE_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT: {messageCount, plural, one {Threema message from} other {# Threema messages from}}
messenger.NAME: Name
messenger.GROUP_DELETE_REALLY: Do you really want to delete this group completely? All members will be removed.
messenger.GROUP_REALLY_LEAVE_ADMIN: You are the administrator of this group. If you leave it now, it will become orphaned. The other members will still be able to chat but changes will no longer be possible.
messenger.GROUP_REALLY_LEAVE: Do you really want to leave this group?
messenger.DISTRIBUTION_LIST_DELETE_REALLY: Do you really want to remove this distribution list?
messenger.PRIVATE_CHAT_DESCRIPTION: Private chat are not supported in Threema Web.
messenger.MESSAGE_TOO_LONG_SPLIT_BODY: No more than {max} characters can be sent per message, do you want to split it into {count} separate messages?
messenger.BALLOT_MESSAGES_NOT_SUPPORTED: Ballot messages are not yet supported in Threema Web.
messenger.DELETE_THREAD_MESSAGE: {count, plural, one {Do you really want to delete this chat? You will not be able to recover the messages.} other {Do you really want to delete # chat(s)? You will not be able to recover the messages.}}

error.NO_CONNECTION: Connection error, please try again later.
error.CONTACT_BLOCKED: You cannot send messages to a blocked contact.
error.FILE_TOO_LARGE: Currently files larger than 15 MiB cannot be sent through Threema Web
error.TEXT_TOO_LONG: This message is too long and cannot be sent (Max length {max} characters).
error.NOTIFICATION_PERMISSION_DENIED: You have to grant the notification permission for Threema Web manually in order to receive desktop notifications.
error.NOTIFICATION_API_NOT_AVAILABLE: Your browser does not support desktop notifications.

about.OPEN_SOURCE: Threema Web is fully open source.
about.SOURCE_CODE: The source code and the licensing terms can be found on Github:
about.EMOJI_ART: Emoji art supplied by EmojiOne
about.NOTIFICATION_SOUND: Sound files © 2012 soundsnap.com - Licensed under the Soundsnap License
about.LICENSE_LINK_BEFORE: Licenses of used open source components can be found
about.CHANGELOG_LINK_BEFORE: The Threema Web changelog can be found

version.NEW_VERSION_BODY: A new version of Threema Web ({version}) is available. Check out the {changelog} for more information. Click "OK" to activate the update.

battery.LEVEL_LOW: Your device battery level is low ({percent}%).
battery.LEVEL_CRITICAL: Your device battery level is critical ({percent}%)!
